title: "Get started"

The genomake package is a collections of scripts and pipeline written in python to analyze with genomic data.

This package is a WIP.

# Installation

Genomeka can be installed via conda using 
```{.yaml}
test
test2:
  - azerty
  - querty:
    - psolomon
    - xyz
test3
```
